= FAQ =

*Q: AltDrag does not work in VirtualBox when using Linux as a host OS. Why?*
  * A: AltDrag does not work since your window manager is intercepting the alt keypress so you can move the VirtualBox window. You can reassign the hotkey for AltDrag as a workaround. For more information, read issue 23.
